text:
!! Kanban Status Overview

<<KanbanBoard columns:"[[To Do]] [[Working]] [[Done]]" query:"tag[Task]" actionfield:"Status">>
title: Status Board

text:
Group: <$select field="groupfield"> Filter: <$select field="filterfield">


!!Task Overview <$macrocall $name="groupedtable" tag="Task" groupfield={{!!groupfield}} fieldlist="title,Status,Owner" filtercriteria={{!!filterfield}} />
title: Task Overview

text:
The following tiddlers demonstrate features of the plugin:

* [[Task Overview]] shows the GroupedTable in action
* [[Status Board]] shows the TiddlyKanban in action
* [[Owner Board]] is another example of TiddlyKanban
* [[2022 / 01 / 04 / 09:25:29 / Grocery List]] or [[2022 / 01 / 04 / 09:26:26 / Recipe]] demonstrates the RTEditor in view mode
title: Start
